title: Utah's Mike Conley Jr.
description:
Utah Jazz guard Mike Conley Jr., joins The Woj Pod to discuss his overcoming a slow start to his Jazz career, building the best record in the Western Conference, building a candidacy for his first All-Star appearance, how the Jazz mended Mitchell-Gobert relationship, remembering the late Sekou Smith and much more. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Adrian Wojnarowski
